text.text: Extension in due date of Need based Scholarship for Fall, 2020

text: All the students are informed that last date to apply for need based scholarship (Fall'2020 semester) has been extended till Thursday, November 12, 2020.
On 2020-11-06, MSCS department sent out this email to all MSCS students from

text.text: To find email addresses of other VU students

text: , log in to your VU Gmail account and then visit this link:

It will take some time to load. Eventually, it will display all the email addresses that are present in the VU organization.

The administrators have kept some addresses hidden probably for privacy and to fight spam.

You can look up other students from your batch, using your VU ID.

text.text: Kindly do not use abuse this system.

text: So far, VU has not provided any way for students to communicate with each other.

text.text: If you misuse it, then administrators can hide the directory, and we will not be able to discover our fellow batch members.
Issuance of 1st Voucher to Continuing Students (Fall-2020 Semester)

text:
Students are informed that the University has issued first voucher (Semester Enrollment fee + One Course fee) for Fall, 2020 semester to continuing students, who have made course selection from October 29, 2020 to November 09, 2020. Furthermore, the University has already issued said fee voucher to those who made course selection prior to October 29, 2020.

You are directed to deposit payable voucher as per given schedule.

is not available for selection in the first semester of MSCS.

⚠️ About MSCS course selection ⚠️
Official VU response:

As per HEC guidelines,

text.text: In first semester, you should choose two required courses and one course from your specialization.

text: You can choose courses from any semester but it is better to choose two required courses and one course from your specialization even if these are 2nd or any semester courses.

text.text: Board of Governors of Virtual University had a meeting with the President of Pakistan

text:
President of Pakistan, Dr Arif Alvi tweeted about Virtual University.
He said

text.text: Vitual University will lead the way towards a future of non-elitist higher education, available at much lower cost than that available at physical brick & mortar universities. A great opportunity for those who pass FA/FSc, need to earn livelihood, & at same time study for BA/BSc.

and

courses in a semester.

Last chance to deposit fee for admission in fall 2020 session

text: Applicants whose Admission Application Forms were accepted for admission in their respective study program are informed to

text.text: deposit “Admission Fee Voucher” on or before Wednesday, November 18, 2020
